maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/832/set.orig: I know that you wanna meet up with your friends, but do we have to stand out in the cold?\. I'm freezing!
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/832/set.text: Je sais que tu veux rencontrer tes amis, mais on est obligé de rester planté là dans le froid ?\. Je me les pèle !

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/832/set.orig: Maybe I want them to see us without searching half the town.
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/832/set.text: Peut-être que j'ai envie de les voir sans qu'ils aient besoin de nous chercher dans la moitié de la ville.

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/832/set.orig: Besides, why are you complaining about the virtual cold anyway?
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/832/set.text: Et surtout, pourquoi tu te plains du froid virtuel ?

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/832/set.orig: Hey, you can modify your Avatar-senses remember?\. Got them sized to the max!
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/832/set.text: Hé, tu peux modifier tes sens d'avatar, t'as oublié ?\. J'ai mis les miens au maximum !

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/832/set.orig: Alright, but... why do that and complain?
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/832/set.text: Oui, mais alors... pourquoi tu viens te plaindre après ?

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/832/set.orig: Because roleplaying is all about the immersion, duh?
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/832/set.text: Parce qu'il y a besoin d'immersion dans un jeu de rôle, peut-être ?

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: Oh...\.\.\. Oh...\.\.\. What should I do?
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: Oh...\.\.\. Oh...\.\.\. Qu'est-ce que je dois faire ?

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: Oh... Hi...
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: Oh... Salut...

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: Hi...
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: Salut...

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: I'm sorry, I'm just too distracted to really talk right now.
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: Je suis désolé, je suis trop distrait pour parler maintenant.

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: There is just no time.
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: On a juste pas le temps.

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: You probably know who I am right?
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: Tu sais probablement qui je suis, non ?

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: [shakes head]
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: Wait, what? Really? \.\.\. But I'm \c[3]Holiday Man\c[0]!
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: Hein quoi ? Vraiment ?\.\.\. Mais je suis pourtant \c[3]l'Homme Vacance\c[0] !

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: Giving gifts and bringing joy and peace to people? No?
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: Je donne des cadeaux et j'apporte la joie et la paix aux gens ? Ça ne te rappelle rien ?

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: [shakes head]
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: Aw man... \.\.\. Maybe you are just new here...
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: Oh mon dieu...\.\.\. Peut-être que tu es un peu nouveau ici...

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: Whatever, I don't have the time!
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: Peu importe, je n'ai pas le temps !

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: Look, I have to get all these presents here to certain players in CrossWorlds.
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: Regarde, je dois distribuer tous ces cadeaux à certains joueurs de CrossWorlds.

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: And I have to do it NOW.
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: Et il faut que je le fasse MAINTENANT.

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: I should have started earlier...
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: J'aurais dû commencer plus tôt...

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: Wait\..\..\.. I know this comes out of nowhere, but could you help me?
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: Attends\..\..\.. Je sais que ça peut paraître soudain, mais est-ce que tu peux m'aider ?

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: I promise you'll get something too!
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: Je te promets que tu auras aussi quelque chose !

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: Yes! Thank you so much. This makes things so much easier.
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: Oui ! Merci beaucoup. Ça rend les choses bien plus faciles !

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: Alright, let's split the work. You go find the players here in \c[3]Bergen\c[0], then \c[3]\v[area.bergen-trails.name]\c[0], \c[3]\v[area.autumn-area.name]\c[0] and finally \c[3]\v[area.rookie-harbor.name]\c[0].
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: Bon, on partage le travail. Tu t'occupes des joueurs ici à \c[3]Bergen\c[0], puis le \c[3]\v[area.bergen-trails.name]\c[0], \c[3]\v[area.autumn-area.name]\c[0] et enfin \c[3]\v[area.rookie-harbor.name]\c[0].

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: I will take care of the west and north of CrossWorlds.
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: Je vais m'occuper de l'ouest et du nord de CrossWorlds.

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: Here, take these presents.
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: Tiens, prends ces cadeaux.

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: \v[item.169.name] x 16
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: \v[item.169.name] x 16

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: Ah, yeah about the players...
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: Ah, oui, à propos des joueurs...

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: I don't really know who they are... It's a kind of secret Santa thing.
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: Je ne sais pas vraiment qui ils sont... C'est un peu un secret de Saint-Nicolas.
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.note: not using père noël, caus the game tries to avoid using christmas anyway... so pick the canadian version instead.

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: But in each area it's always a \c[3]Triblader\c[0], \c[3]Hexacast\c[0], \c[3]Pentafist\c[0] and \c[3]Quadroguard\c[0].
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: Mais dans chaque région, il y a toujours un \c[3]Triblader\c[0], un \c[3]Hexacast\c[0], un \c[3]Pentafist\c[0] et un \c[3]Quadroguard\c[0].

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: You will know when you find them.
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: Tu les reconnaîtras quand tu les verras.

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: Well... Come back once you're done, okay?
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: Bien... Reviens quand tu auras fini, OK ?

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: [nods]
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: [acquiesce]

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: Alright, until then!
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: Bien ! À plus !

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: Noooo!\.\.\. Okay, no hard feelings.
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: Noooon !\.\.\. C'est bon, je ne t'en veux pas.

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: You still have some presents left to give I see.
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: Tu dois encore des cadeaux à distribuer, je vois.

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: Don't wait too long, we'll have to do this quick!
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: N'attends pas trop longtemps, il faut se dépêcher !

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: [nods]
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: [acquiesce]

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: Oh... you are back! We have a problem!
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: Oh... Tu es de retour ! On a un problème !

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: I was on my way to my secret place to get some presents for the rest of them...
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: J'étais en train d'aller à ma cachette secrète pour aller chercher des cadeaux pour ceux qui restent...

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: ...and this weird looking snowman just popped up and attacked.
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: ... et ce bonhomme de neige au look curieux est apparu et m'a attaqué.

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: I couldn't do anything. I'm good at gifting people stuff, not fighting.
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: Je ne pouvais rien faire. Je suis bon en cadeaux, pas en combat.

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: You gotta help me! If we don't defeat this thing, all of the presents might be destroyed!
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: Tu dois m'aider ! Si on ne réussit pas à vaincre ce truc, tous les cadeaux risquent d'être détruits !
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.note: damn this vaincre verb; it's hard to use.

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: That's a "yes", right?
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: Ça veut dire "oui", c'est ça ?

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: [nods]
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: [acquiesce]

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: Oh... alright!
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: Oh... C'est bon !

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: Okay, my secret stash is over here.
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: OK, ma cachette secrète est là-bas.

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: I'll lower the wall so you can get in.
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: Je vais baisser la paroi pour que tu puisses rentrer.

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: Please save my presents!
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: S'il te plait, sauve mes cadeaux !

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: Please save my presents!
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: S'il te plait, sauve mes cadeaux !

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: Did you do it? Did you defeat the gift-destroying fiend?
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: Tu as réussi ? Tu as vaincu le vilain destructeur de cadeau ?

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: [nods]
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: [acquiesce]

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: Oh, you did? Ha! What a relief...
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: Oh, vraiment ? Pfiou, quel soulagement...

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: And... \.\.\. How are my presents?
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: Et...\.\.\. Comment vont mes cadeaux ?
Salut...\.\.\. Lea...

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: Oh... wait, what?
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: Oh... attends, quoi ?

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: "Lea" is not the answer I expected.
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: "Lea" n'était pas la réponse que j'attendais.

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: OH! It's your name?!
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: OH ! C'est ton nom ?!

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: Oh no, how rude of me to not ask for your name.
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: Oh non, quelle impolitesse de ma part de ne pas l'avoir demandé.

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: No wonder you've been so quiet all the time.
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: Je comprends maintenant pourquoi tu étais si silencieuse pendant tout ce temps.

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: Don't worry about my presents! I will check for myself.
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: Ne t'inquiète pas à propos de mes cadeaux ! Je vais m'en occuper.

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: Thanks a lot for helping me with all of this.
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: Merci, merci beaucoup pour m'avoir aidé !

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: Ahm... \.\.\. Here, take my hat as a reward!
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: Hem...\.\.\. Tiens, prends mon chapeau comme récompense !

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: \v[item.168.name]
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: \v[item.168.name]

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: May it bring as much joy to you as it did to me!
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: Qu'il t'apporte autant de joie qu'il m'en a apporté !

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: Is something the matter?
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: Qu'est-ce qu'il y a ?

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: Don't worry, the hat is almost new!
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: Ne t'inquiète pas, le chapeau est presque neuf !

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: I knew you would like it!
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: Je savais qu'il te plairait !

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: Again, thanks a lot! Let's chat again soon!
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: Encore merci ! Faudrait qu'on rediscute, un de ces jours !

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: [nods]
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: [acquiesce]

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: Holiday Man
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: Homme Vacance

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: Hey, Lea, nice to see you!
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: Hé, Lea, c'est bon de te voir !

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: Hi!
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: Salut !

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: I have to say, without my hat, I feel kinda\..\..\.. naked.
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: Je dois dire, sans mon chapeau, je me sens un peu\..\..\.. tout nu.

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: But it does suit you much better!
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: Mais il te va bien mieux !

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: Ah yes! I have another present for you!
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: Ah oui ! J'ai un autre cadeau pour toi !

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: Here you go!
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: Tiens !

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: \v[item.16.name]
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: \v[item.16.name]

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: Took me some time to find a pair of the right size.
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: Ça m'a pris un peu de temps de trouver une paire de la bonne taille.

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: I'm sure it will go well together with that \c[3]\v[item.168.name]\c[0]!
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: Je suis sûr qu'ils iront bien avec ton \c[3]\v[item.168.name]\c[0] !

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: [nods]
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: [acquiesce]

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: Oh yes! I think I may have another present for you!
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: Ah oui ! Je crois que j'ai un autre cadeau pour toi !

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: ...Though I think I need a bit more time to prepare it.
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: ... Bien qu'il me faille un peu plus de temps pour le préparer.

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: Maybe come back sometime later?
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: Peut-être tu devrais revenir plus tard ?

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.orig: [nods]
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/836/set.text: [acquiesce]

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/853/set.text: Des cadeaux pour tout le monde !

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/861/set.orig: Ah oui, we made it! La Bergen!
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/861/set.text: Ah oui, on a réussi ! V'La Bergen !
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/861/set.note: the original text is bad, what can i do ?

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/861/set.orig: You made it, Lea! This is \c[3]Bergen\c[0], the snow village.
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/861/set.text: Tu as réussi, Lea ! C'est \c[3]Bergen\c[0], le village des neiges.

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/861/set.orig: After that long climb I sure wouldn't mind a break in one of those cozy houses...
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/861/set.text: Après avoir grimpé si longtemps, je ferais bien une pause dans une de ces maisons mignonnes...

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/861/set.orig: Hm, would you call this a snow village?\. I mean it's a village and there is snow...
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/861/set.text: Hm, Est-ce qu'il faut appeler ça un village des neiges ?\. Je veux dire, c'est un village et il y a de la neige...

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/861/set.orig: The next dungeon should be close by.
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/861/set.text: Le prochain donjon ne devrait pas être loin.

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/861/set.orig: I hope they let you enter without a huge load of exposition.
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/861/set.text: J'espère qu'ils nous laisseront entrer sans devoir se farcir un grand exposé.

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/861/set.orig: Anyway, if I remember correctly the next dungeon should be close by.
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/861/set.text: Bon, si je me souviens bien, le prochain donjon devrait être dans les parages.

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/861/set.orig: You probably should tell Emilie when you plan to enter, correct?
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/861/set.text: Tu devrais probablement faire un signe à Emilie avant d'y entrer, non ?

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/868/set.orig: You see that house over there?
The townsfolk are pretty quiet about it, but something very very strange is going on over there.
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/868/set.text: Les gens du coin sont assez silencieux là-dessus, mais il s'y passe quelque chose de très étrange.

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/868/set.orig: Some nights, I swear I see light coming out of the cracks even though the house has been abandoned for years.
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/868/set.text: Certaines nuits, je jure que je vois des lumières qui brillent à travers les fissures, alors que la maison est abandonnée depuis des années.

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/886/set.orig: Urgh, this guy is blocking the storage house again.
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/886/set.text: Pff, ce type bloque encore l'entrepôt.

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/886/set.orig: I wish he would meditate somewhere else. Under a waterfall or whatever.
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/886/set.text: Si seulement il pouvait aller méditer ailleurs. Sous une chute d'eau ou chez pas quoi.

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/895/set.orig: Hm, what's this small house doing on this side of the river?
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/895/set.text: Hm. Qu'est-ce que cette petite maison fait de l'autre côté de la rivière ?

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/895/set.orig: It must be really inconvenient to live here, having to jump over the water everyday.
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/895/set.text: Ça doit être assez pénible de vivre ici, de devoir sauter au-dessus de l'eau tous les jours.

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/900/set.orig: Halt, \v[lore.title.seeker]!\. I, a guard of Bergen, have business with you!
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/900/set.text: Halte, \v[lore.title.seeker] !\. Moi, un garde de Bergen, j'ai quelque chose à vous dire !

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/900/set.orig: Yes, greetings.\. I have been sent by our leader, Sgt. Brassler, to take this rogue goat into custody.
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/900/set.text: Oui, mes compliments.\. J'ai été envoyé par notre chef, le Sgt. Brassler, pour mettre ce chevreau sauvage en détention.
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/900/set.note: note that Sergent Brassler is the rookie harbur chief, not bergen. assuming it's intended

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/900/set.orig: Yes, I was told to take her outside the city where she belongs.
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/900/set.text: Oui, on m'a dit de l'amener hors de la ville là où sa place se trouve.

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/900/set.orig: You are a good little goat, yes you are.
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/900/set.text: Toi tu es un gentil petit chevreau, oh oui.

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/900/set.orig: Well... I will take care of this.\. You... can report back to the headquarters now.
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/900/set.text: Bon... Je vais m'occuper de ça.\. Toi... tu peux aller faire un rapport au QG.
Oui, oui, bien sûr.\. À plus tard !

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.orig: Bill Masters
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.text: Bill Masters

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.orig: Bill Masters
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.text: Bill Masters

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.orig: Hi.
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.text: Salut.

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.orig: \v[lore.title.seeker].\. A loyal soldier of the \v[lore.title.human-government], I assume?
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.text: \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Un loyal serviteur des \v[lore.title.human-government], je présume ?

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.orig: [nods]
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.text: [acquiesce]

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.orig: EXCELLENT!\. A brother in arms is always welcome in this war of ours!
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.text: EXCELLENT !\. Un frère d'armes est toujours le bienvenu dans cette guerre que nous menons.

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.orig: H-hi?!
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.text: S-Salut ?!

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.orig: Oh, don't let these moments of peace fool you.\. The next foe is always somewhere behind the corner.
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.text: Oh, ne te laisse pas avoir par cette paix momentanée.\. Le prochain ennemi est toujours là, planqué dans un coin.

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.orig: For that reason we always need to get ourself properly equipped with the best military hardware.
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.text: C'est pour cette raison qu'il faut toujours qu'on soit correctement équipé avec le meilleur matos militaire possible.

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.orig: How?
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.text: Comment ?

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.orig: The Track, \v[lore.title.seeker]!\. The damn Track and all its thrice-forsaken energy, by the Ancients!
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.text: Le Tracé, \v[lore.title.seeker] !\. Le satané Tracé et toute sa fichue énergie, par les Anciens !

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.orig: And as fate has it, some spectacular hardware is just within our reach.\. Can we count on you, \v[lore.title.seeker]?
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.text: Et le destin fait que du matériel spectaculaire se trouve juste à portée de main.\. Est-ce que l'on peut compter sur vous, \v[lore.title.seeker] ?

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.orig: [nods]
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.text: [acquiesce]

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.orig: HURRAH!\. Exactly the right decision, \v[lore.title.seeker]!
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.text: HOURRA !\. C'est la bonne décision que vous avez prise, \v[lore.title.seeker] !

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.orig: Now onto your mission.\. There is an armored combat vehicle some arms company once produced for us.
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.text: Maintenant pour votre mission.\. Il y a un véhicule de combat armé qu'une société d'armement a fabriquée pour nous.

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.orig: Some of those eggheads thought it was a good idea to let one of them damn track creatures ride it!
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.text: Une poignée de crânes d'œufs a cru que c'était une bonne idée de laisser une de ces satanées créatures du tracé se mettre aux commandes !

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.orig: ... why?
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.text: ... pourquoi ?

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.orig: Heck if I know, \v[lore.title.seeker]!\. Scientists and their weird ideas, am I right?
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.text: Qu'est-ce que j'en sais, \v[lore.title.seeker] !\. Les scientifiques et leurs idées farfelues, hein, n'est-ce pas ?

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.orig: In any case, I want you to get those things back to us and find the abandoned facility that produced it!
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.text: En tout cas, je veux que vous les rameniez et que vous trouviez l'usine abandonnée qui l'a produite !

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.orig: Go to the \c[3]Old Plateau in \v[area.bergen-trails.name]\c[0] and kick those heavily armed butts!
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.text: Allez au \c[3]Vieux Plateau sur le \v[area.bergen-trails.name]\c[0] et bottez-moi ces derrières lourdement armés !

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.orig: [nods]
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.text: [acquiesce]

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.orig: Bye.
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.text: Bye.

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.orig: [shakes head]
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.orig: WHAT?\. IMPOSSIBLE!\.\. HOW CAN THIS BE?
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.text: QUOI ?\. C'EST PAS POSSIBLE !\.\. C'EST INACCEPTABLE !

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.orig: Please reconsider your duty, \v[lore.title.seeker]. Hesitation is not an option!
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.text: Il faut que vous remplissiez votre devoir, \v[lore.title.seeker]. L'hésitation n'est pas une option !

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.orig: ...bye?
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.text: ... bye ?

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.orig: Bill Masters
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.text: Bill Masters

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.orig: The heavily armed creatures loiter around on the \c[3]Old Plateau in \v[area.bergen-trails.name]\c[0].\. Kick their butts!
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.text: Les créatures lourdement armées zonent sur le \c[3]Vieux Plateau du \v[area.bergen-trails.name]\c[0].\. Allez les anéantir !

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.orig: Bill Masters
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.text: Bill Masters
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.note: probably ref to halo, check halo trans

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.orig: Hi.
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.text: Salut.

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.orig: \v[lore.title.seeker], my man!\. Finally you made your triumphant return!
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.text: \v[lore.title.seeker], mon ami !\. Enfin vous faites votre retour triomphal !

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.orig: Lea.
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.text: Lea.

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.orig: You can be proud of yourself, soldier.\. The data you collected will be of great use for our defense force.
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.text: Vous pouvez être fier de vous, soldat.\. Les données que vous avez récupérées seront très utiles pour nos forces armées.

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.orig: It will help to create many amazing weapons and save many lifes.
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.text: Ils vont nous aider à créer de nombreuses armes étonnantes et sauver de nombreuses vies.

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.orig: I give you a salute and also your reward, courtesy of the \v[lore.title.human-government]!
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.text: Voici votre récompense, de la part des \v[lore.title.human-government] !

maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.orig: Now excuse me, I have to deliver my own report.\. Dismissed!
maps/bergen/bergen.json/entities/926/set.text: Maintenant, veuillez m'excuser, il faut que je fasse mon propre rapport moi aussi.\. Rompez !
